Html:
Hi

I am able to detect when the file is playing but Is there a way to consume a .wav file with 2 channels (I do not want to play it) and then loop through the data to detect how many times a certain pitch occurs?

You can use FFT or autocorrelation, but if you are new to Digital Signal Processing, you may find you need to spend quite a bit of time learning about how these techniques work. NAudio includes an FFT implementation in the FastFourierTransform class.
